Package ohos.data.distributed.device

Interface DeviceChangeCallback


  • public interface DeviceChangeCallback
    Represents the callback for device status changes.

    You need to implement this class and call the KvManager.registerDeviceChangeCallback(ohos.data.distributed.device.DeviceChangeCallback, ohos.data.distributed.device.DeviceFilterStrategy) method to register the DeviceChangeCallback. The callback will be invoked when the status of a device changes (online or offline).

    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_DISTRIBUTEDDATAMGR

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onChanged​(DeviceInfo info, DeviceStatus status)
      Called when the device status changes.

    • Method Detail

      • onChanged

        void onChanged​(DeviceInfo info,
               DeviceStatus status)
        Called when the device status changes.

        This callback is invoked when a device goes online or offline.

        Parameters:
        info - Indicates the device information.
        status - Indicates the device status after the status change.
        Since:
        3
